QuestData.Title: Dreadspinner Extermination
QuestData.Description: Back in Gurthani Terrace where you found me, dreadspinners continue to occupy the attention of Shado-Pan marksmen who could otherwise be thinning out this wretched swarm.$B$BEradicate those spiders and offer some relief to the archers on that wall.
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay 8 Dreadspinner Tenders in the Terrace of Gurthan. Speak with Kil'ruk the Wind-Reaver for an air-drop.
